imdb.title: The Lion Man: African Safari
akas: The Lion Man: African Safari (South Africa)
plot: Craig Busch, an experienced self-taught "wild cat trainer", creates a haven for rare, endangered cats such as white Bengal Tigers, Barbary Lions and White Lions at a reserve near Johannesburg.
